cleaned_text: THE BLUE MOON CRYSTAL MEDITATION £35 Blue Moon Crystal Meditation, Crystal Recharge and Sacred Cacao Join Cristina at the Bamford Wellness Spa Cotswolds for an evening of powerful culmination and closure by the moonlight. Recharge your crystals and drink sacred cacao for self-reflection during a guided moonlight meditation. We will let go of what no longer serves our higher purpose - people, situations, and outdated ways of being. The session will end with a Sound Healing Bath. - 18:30 - 20.30 pm, Wednesday, 30th August -
